subject: Parallel execution (was: Re: [junit] Does JUnit 4 now support dependencies?)
msgSnippet: On Thu, Jul 17, 2008 at 3:39 PM, Daniel Brolund ... FYI, We re looking at parallel execution as a baked-in optional feature in JUnit {4.n | n = 6}.  We d love
messageBody:
On Thu, Jul 17, 2008 at 3:39 PM, Daniel Brolund
<daniel.brolund@...> wrote:
> [... parallel execution ...]

FYI, We're looking at parallel execution as a baked-in optional
feature in JUnit {4.n | n >= 6}. We'd love to hear early experience
reports from people who have already extended JUnit for parallel
execution. Thanks,

David Saff
